description.value:
The chwinga targets a &Reference[humanoid]{humanoid} it can see within 5 feet of it. The target gains a supernatural charm of the DM’s choice. See the Dungeon Master’s Guide for information on supernatural charms.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

The chwinga magically takes shelter inside a rock, a living &Reference[plant]{plant}, or a natural source of fresh water in its space. The chwinga can’t be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect while inside this shelter, and the shelter doesn’t impair the chwinga’s &Reference[blindsight]{blindsight}. The chwinga can use its action to emerge from a shelter. If its shelter is destroyed, the chwinga is forced out and appears in the shelter’s space, but is otherwise unharmed.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

The chwinga casts one of the following spells, requiring no &Reference[material]{material} or &Reference[vocal]{verbal} components:

At will: druidcraft, guidance, pass without trace, resistance

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Evasion. When the chwinga is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a &Reference[dex]{Dexterity} saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Unusual &Reference[nat]{Nature}. The chwinga doesn’t require air, food, or drink. When it dies, it turns into a handful of flower petals, a cloud of pollen, a stone statuette resembling its former self, a tiny &Reference[sphere]{sphere} of smooth stone, or a puddle of fresh water (your choice).

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Whispering to the spirits of &Reference[nat]{nature}, you create one of the following effects within range:

  • You create a tiny, harmless sensory effect that predicts what the weather will be at your location for the next 24 hours. The effect might manifest as a golden orb for clear skies, a cloud for rain, falling snowflakes for snow, and so on. This effect persists for 1 round.
  • You instantly make a flower blossom, a seed pod open, or a leaf bud bloom.
  • You create an instantaneous, harmless sensory effect, such as falling leaves, a puff of wind, the sound of a small animal, or the faint odor of skunk. The effect must fit in a 5-foot &Reference[cube]{cube}.
  • You instantly light or snuff out a candle, a torch, or a small campfire.

You touch one willing creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one ability check of its choice. It can roll the die before or after making the ability check. The spell then ends.

A veil of shadows and silence radiates from you, masking you and your companions from detection. For the duration, each creature you choose within 30 feet of you (including you) has a +10 bonus to &Reference[dex]{Dexterity} (&Reference[ste]{Stealth}) checks and can't be tracked except by magical means. A creature that receives this bonus leaves behind no tracks or other traces of its passage.

materials.value: ashes from a burned leaf of mistletoe and a sprig of spruce

description.value: You touch one willing creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one saving throw of its choice. It can roll the die before or after making the saving throw. The spell then ends.
